div.head: 小便秘
div.div: minor relief blocked; urine is blocked

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: minor relief blocked; urine is blocked

sense.def: IS, Pathological Condition identical with xiao bian bu li 小便不利 , urine does not flow freely. San yin ji yi bing zheng fang lun 三因極一病證方論 3da huang zuo jing tang 大黃左經湯:喘，加桑白皮、紫蘇； 小便秘，加澤瀉 , “[If the patient] pants, add sang bai pi and zi su . [In case his] urine is blocked, add ze xie ”.
